product_name: SkirtSports Tough Chick Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With full coverage that provides warmth without weighing you down, the SkirtSports Tough Girl top is built to keep you comfortable during cold-weather workouts. Moisture-wicking polyester provides lightweight warmth and keeps you dry during active pursuits; added spandex offers comfortable stretch. Extra-long sleeves feature thumbholes to keep sleeves in place while wrists and hands stay warm on cool-weather runs. Half-zip opening allows instant ventilation; reflective details increase visibility in low light. The SkirtSports Tough Girl top has a relaxed but tailored fit for comfortable style. Closeout.
short_description: With full coverage that provides warmth without weighing you down, the SkirtSports Tough Girl top is built to keep you comfortable during cold-weather workouts.
